Following a certain dialogue branch for the first time gives four [[Sumeru Rose]]s.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Mandana:''' Following the instructions in the manual really did make the flowers bloom really well.
:{{DIcon}} The manual?
::'''Mandana:''' Yes, it's a nursing manual on ornamental plants the Lord gave me. I heard it was personally revised by a [[Forest Watcher]].
::'''Mandana:''' Following the instructions in the manual guarantees that beautiful flowers bloom all year round here.
::{{DIcon|Reward}} Lovely.
:::'''Mandana:''' Thanks, I'll take it as a compliment on the good job I did for the garden.
:::'''Mandana:''' Cutting a fresh flower with its leaves on, put it into a vase with water, and you'll make a very nice interior decoration.
:::'''Mandana:''' These are for you. Beautiful flowers will bring you good luck.
::;(Obtain {{Item|Sumeru Rose|x=4}})
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Mandana:''' See you.
{{Dialogue End}}
